element.label: Able to locate the "Downtime Forms" folder
element.name: bca_folder

element.label: Confirm "Epic BCA Printing 2017" icon is on the desktop
element.name: icon_desktop

element.label: Have enough supply of Avery 5160 Label sheets to print ADT labels
element.name: labels

element.label: Upon windows login, confirm BCA Application auto launches within 90 secs
element.name: launch_bca

element.label: Able to locate the BCA (downtime) computer
element.name: locate_bca

element.label: Able to locate BCA binder near the BCA computer
element.name: locate_bca_binder

element.label: Able to Log into the BCA Application using Epic Username and Password
element.name: login_bca

element.label: Able to log into windows using the BCA Username and Password on the BCA computer
element.name: login_windows

element.label: Able to print 1 downtime form from within the "Downtime Forms" folder
element.name: print_downtime

element.label: Able to print 1 BCA Report to the locally attached printer
element.name: print_report

element.label: Have enough supply of printed downtime forms for use
element.name: supply
